summary: Modifies the Daedric Armor set into Light Armor, with stats equivalent to the Dragonscale set.
descriptionHtml:
---Version 1.5---
This mod does two things:
- It modifies the default Daedric Armor set from Heavy to Light Armor in order to make use of   perks gained from the Light Armor tree.  
- It then re-balances the armor, weight and value stats to mirror those of Dragonscale Armor.
I actually preferred the look of Daedric armor to Dragonscale, and created this mod as an aesthetic alternative for Light Armor classes.

Installation (Recommended):
Download via the Nexus Mod Manager. 

Installation (Manual):
Move the .esp file into your default Skyrim data folder.  The filepath will most likely be C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data.  On the Skyrim launcher screen, under Data Files, make sure Daedric Light Armor.esp is checked.  Enjoy.

Bugs and Comments:
I\'ve found none so far.  Please include a detailed description of any bugs encountered under the comments section.  All comments are appreciated.

To do:
- Create an alternate Heavy Armor version with reduced weight only.
- Create a visual overhaul of the Light Armor version.

---Version 1.0---
Modifies the Daedric Armor set into Light Armor, while retaining all default values.  For those individuals who have played the game with the Light Armor tree maxed and want the look of the Daedric Armor.  Have your cake and eat it too.
author: Capularis
